description.short: Scrums for Channels helps you get status updates from your team.
description.full: Scrums for Channels is a simple scrum assistant that will enable users to run asynchronous stand-up meetings and provide an easy way for the users to share their daily updates.

commands.title: Open settings
commands.description: Opens the settings task module to add or update scrums

commands.title: Help
commands.description: Shows the operations I can perform
